headline: PLASMA-THERM DUAL PLASMA ETCH AND REACTIVE ION ETCH SYSTEM 200MM
description:
Dual Plasma Etch and Reactive 
Ion Etch Processing Systems    System consists of a process chamber, upper electrode (with gas feed), and substrate electrode.
specstable:
Manufacturer Plasma-Therm
Model Wafer Batch 740/740
Wafer Size Range
Minimum 100 mm
Maximum 200 mm
Process Plasma and Reactive Ion Etch
Controller Type Microprocessor Controller Type
End Point Detection Included
High Vacuum Pump Leybold 361C
Roughing Pump Ebara A10S
RF Generator Model None
Number of Gas Inputs Four Gas
Chillers
Number of Chillers 1
Chiller #1Manufacturer/Model Tek-Temp MM1500/3000
Other Information Refurbishment to include the following:
  • Control Upgrade:
    Our operating system upgrade has been developed as a direct replacement control system for PlasmaTherm process tools using off-the-shelf IO components and modern Windows Vista compatible control system software. A complete replacement of all IO and signal wiring is performed. None of the original IO is used. A full set of system documentation is provided which includes wiring diagrams, IO listings, OEM equipment spec sheets, and full system software source code.
  • MFCs will be sent out for cleaning and recalibration; filters will be replaced.
  • Wet clean of process chambers.
  • Installation of rebuilt Leybold 361C turbo pump and controller.
    NB: Please note that the dual chamber configuration is designed to operate sequentially. The RF generator and vacuum sources are shared for each process chamber. However each chamber has its own set of four MFCs.

    • Exterior Dimensions
    Width 45.000 in (114.3 cm)
    Depth 43.000 in (109.2 cm)
    Height 73.000 in (185.4 cm)
